Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class FormEnum

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.FormEnum
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormIterator
public class FormEnum extends Object implements FormIterator
This object is outputed by an Alix field FieldCharsAbstract, to provide list of terms with stats, for example for queries. according to filters or queries; calculated by th

  • Constructor Details

    • FormEnum

      public FormEnum(FieldText field)
      Build a form enumerator from an alix FieldText, sharing properties useful to calcultate scores for some queries :
      • Dictionary of forms FieldCharsAbstract.dic
      • docsByform[formId] = docs; count of docs by form FieldCharsAbstract.docsByform.
      • Σ docsByForm; global count of docs relevant for this field FieldAbstract.docsAll.
      • occsByform[formId] = occs; count of occurrences by form FieldText.occsByForm.
      • Σ occsByForm; global count of occs for this field FieldText.occsAll.
      Parameters:
      field - alix stats on an indexed and tokenized lucene field.

    • FormEnum

      public FormEnum(FieldFacet field)
      Build a form enumerator from an alix FieldFacet, sharing properties useful to calcultate scores for some queries :
      • Dictionary of forms FieldCharsAbstract.dic
      • docsByform[formId] = docs; count of docs by form FieldCharsAbstract.docsByform.
      • Σ docsByForm; global count of docs relevant for this field FieldAbstract.docsAll.
      Parameters:
      field - alix stats on an indexed and not tokenized lucene field.
